import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {AttendServiceService} from "./attend-service.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-emp-attendance-live', templateUrl: './emp-attendance-live.component.html', styleUrls: ['./emp-attendance-live.component.css'] }) export class EmpAttendanceLiveComponent implements OnInit { // ng update @angular/cli @angular/core --allow-dirty --force constructor( private attService: AttendServiceService ) { } impProfile:any; ngOnInit(): void { } onResult(result:string){ this.attService.setattden(result).subscribe( data => {this.impProfile =data console.log(this.impProfile) } ) } }
